results.definition: demand as being one's due or property; assert one's right or title to
examples: He claimed his suitcases at the airline counter
Mr. Smith claims special tax exemptions because he is a foreign resident

results.definition: seize and take control without authority and possibly with force; take as one's right or possession
examples: He assumed to himself the right to fill all positions in the town
She seized control of the throne after her husband died
